characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. If used can cast an already used spell (even if miscast or failed to cast).

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: At start of movement phase. Declare single friendly character within 12" that model regains a single Wound lost earlier. Can only target herself is no viable targets are within range.

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: Ward Save 5+ (BRB-44) also to her unit against non-magical attacks

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Resolve a hit like a single bolt from a Bolt Thrower. Multiple Wounds (D3) (BRB-73), Quick to Fire (BRB-73) Units of Dark Elves get a -1 penalty on Ld till end of phase when suffering a casualty.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: ALith and unit he is with have Swiftstride (BRB-76)

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: Ward Save 4+ (BRB-44), Shooting at Alith Anar and unit he is with suffer a -1 to hit.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Ward Save 5+ (BRB-44) for Eltharion and Stormwing

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Magic Resistance (1) (BRB-72). Makes Eltharion a level 2 Wizard who can choose anyone of the eight Lores of Magic.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Use at start of one of your movement phases. +1 To Hit (shooting and close combat) to the whole unit for the remainder of the turn.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Poisoned Attacks must roll to wound normally no auto wound.

characteristic.name: Magical Emination
characteristic.value: Spells from Lore of Light and Life cast by a friendly wizard on a unit with this banner receive a +4 to cast. If Alarielle is slain the ability is lost.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Bolt Thrower (BRB-111), Multiple Wounds (D3) (BRB-73), no armour saves

characteristic.name: Magical Emination
characteristic.value: Spells from Lore of Light and Life cast by a friendly wizard on a unit with this banner receive a +4 to cast. If Alarielle is slain the ability is lost.

entry.name: the eight Lores of Battle Magic

rule.name: Spells
rule.description: 1 spell from ech of the Lores.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: All hits wound on a 2+, no armour saves allowed.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Add a bonus power dice for every cast the phase it is used, or ignore result of miscast. Both cases Teclis has S1 and T1 rest of the game.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Counts as Dispel scroll, but both Teclis and enemy caster roll a D6, if Teclis wins the roll then the spell cast is removed from the game.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Flaming Attacks (BRB-69), Once per battle in shooting phase, Breath Attack S4 (BRB-67)

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Magic Resistance (2) (BRB-72), If Tyrion would suffer a wound that would kill him roll D6 on a 2+ wound is ignored and item is destroyed, otherwise remove Tyrion as casualty.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Before casting a spell. Add 2 Powerdice to roll for spell (use atleast 1 dice from powerdice pool).

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Dispel spell if no IF.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Instead of dispel. Target gets 4+ Ward Save against cast spell.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Can increase dispel result with another +D6. Can contribute to IF dispel.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Can re-roll result on miscast table.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Declare use at start of your magic phase. If bearer's spell is dispelled the enemy wizard suffers a wound (no armour save) on a 5+.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Add +D6 dice to the power pool, also D3 wounds on the bearer (no armour save).

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Can increase cast result with another +D6. Can contribute to IF dispel.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. A Power Scroll can be used when the Wizard makes a casting attempt. During that casting attempt, the casting value of the spell is halved. You cannot choose to boost a spell when using the Power Scroll.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Instead of dispel. Enemy wizard rolls D6 if higher then his wizard level he transforms in a toad. No channel, no casting, no items work, stats reduced to 1 (except W). Controlling player rolls D6 at start of each magic phase, on a 4+ transformation ends.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Instead of dispel. After spell cast add number of power dice used as dispel dice (limit of 12).

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Instead of Dispel. Roll a dice for every dice used to cast the spell. The casting wizard takes a wound for every 5+, no armour saves.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Bearer may re-roll a single dice from each of his casting or dispel attempts. Results of 6 cannot be re-rolled.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Drink at start of any player's turn. +3 I until end of turn

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Drink at start of any player's turn. Gain Immune to Psychology(BRB-71) and Devastating Charge(BRB-68) until end of turn.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Bearer + unit he is with have 6+ WardSave against war machine weapons.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Models in base contact (friends and foes) must re-roll successful Ward Saves.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Drink at the start of any player's turn. +3 T until end of turn.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only. Drink at the start of any player's turn. +3 S until end of turn.

entry.name: BRB - The Terrifying Mask of Eee!

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Cause Terror (BRB-78). Other models cannot use his Ld.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Bound Spell: Power Level 3. Fireball spell (BRB-492)

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: Flying creatures (and their riders) must re-roll succesfull rolls to hit against the bearer (and the unit he is with) in close combat.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: One use only at start of controlling player's turn. Recover D6 Wounds.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: place a Watchtower Building in your deployment zone before army deployment.

characteristic.name: Magic Property
characteristic.value: As lvl 2 Wizard with random chosen Battle Magic lore. Stupidity (BRB-76).

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: Bound Spell (Power Level 3). The Ring of Fury contains the Soul Quench spell (see Lore of High Magic).

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: Fear (BRB-69), against Dwarfs Terror (BRB-78) instead. Dwarfs gain Hatred (BRB-71). For each magic item carried by a Dwarven model in base contact roll a D6 on a 4+ that item is destroyed.

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: One use only. +1 To Wound on all of bearer's spells, shooting and close combat (also his mount). (rolls of 1 still fail). Flaming Attacks (BRB-69)

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: Model on foot only. Ambushers (BRB-79), can give same rule to unit of archers or spearmen up to 30 models before deployment. Must deploy with unit and stay that turn.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Higher Saving Throw modifier then normal

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: One use only. The first hit suffered by the bearer is discounted on a roll of 2+

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: The wearer has a 2+ WardSave against flaming attacks

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: The bearer has a 1+ ArmourSave against shooting attacks

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Enemies suffer a -1 to hit penalty in close combat

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: At the start of each Close Combat phase, choose an enemy character in base contact with the bearer or his unit. That character must immediately take a Leadership test. If the test is failed, the character cannot make attacks and is hit automatically.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Any succesfull roll to wound made against the wearer of the Trickster's Helm must be re-rolled.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: AS cannot be improved, 6+ Ward Save (BRB-44), Fireborn (AB-36)

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Parry Save of 4+ even with Magic Weapon.

characteristic.name: Magical Emination
characteristic.value: One use only. Can re-roll it's first failed Ld test.

characteristic.name: Magical Emination
characteristic.value: +1 Ld, but cannot use Generals Inspiring Presence.

entry.name: AB - Banner of the World Dragon

characteristic.name: Magical Emination
characteristic.value: 2+ Ward Save against all wounds by spells, magic weapons and magical attacks. All Dragons within 12" are Stubborn (BRB-76).

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Stupidity (BRB-76) for a Monster or Character that suffers an unsaved wound for the rest of the game.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Monster or Character that suffers an unsaved wound loses 1A (to min of 1)

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: wound on 5+ unless they would normally need a lower result.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Wizard looses randomly one spell for each unsaved wound.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: +1S and +1A for every enemy character in base contact.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: +3A, rolls to wound on a 6 ignores Armour Saves.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Mounted models only. On charge no armour saves

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: One use only. Re-roll a single failed armour save.

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: 5+ Ward Save against wounds caused in close combat by models with Fly rule.

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: One use only. 4+ Ward Save against first wound suffered.

characteristic.name: Protection
characteristic.value: One use only. Ward Save of 2+ against first unsaved wound even if it's a killing blow or multiple wounds.

rule.name: Always Strikes First (FAQ'ed)
rule.description: ERRATA Change “[...]re-roll failed misses[...]” to “[...]re-roll misses[...]” in the first sentence of the third paragraph.

rule.name: Ambushers (FAQ'ed)
rule.description: ERRATA: Change “[...]start of the turn[...]” to “[...]start of his turn[...]” in the second paragraph

rule.name: Extra Attack (FAQ'ed)
rule.description: ERRATA: Add “Unlike most special rules, the effects of multiple Extra Attack special rules are cumulative.”

rule.name: Fight in Extra Ranks (FAQ'ed)
rule.description: ERRATA Add “Unlike most special rules, the effects of multiple Fight In Extra Ranks special rules are cumulative.”

rule.name: Impact Hits (D6) (FAQ'ed)
rule.description:
ERRATA: Change “[...]this rule has no effect.” to “[...]no Impact Hits are inflicted.”
Add the following sentence to the end of the third paragraph: ‘“Look Out Sir!” rolls cannot be taken against Impact Hits.’

rule.name: Random Movement (FAQ'ed)
rule.description: ERRATA: Add “If a model has the Random Movement and Swiftstride special rules (a chariot with Random Movement, for example), then the Swiftstride special rule is not used.” to the end of the first paragraph.

rule.name: Skirmishers (FAQ'ed)
rule.description:
ERRATA Free Reform. Change “[...]move, provided[...]” to “[...]move, even if it marches, provided[...]”. Change “[...]double its Move value.” to “[...]double its Movement value.”
Light Troops. Change “[...]zero ranks[...]” to “[...]zero ranks in combat[...]”.

rule.name: Sniper (FAQ'ed)
rule.description: ERRATA: Change “A model making a[...]” to “unless making a Stand and Shoot charge reaction, a model making a[...]” at the start of the third paragraph.

rule.name: Vanguard (FAQ'ed)
rule.description: ERRATA: Change “[...]make a 12" move[...]” to “[...]make a move of up to 12"[...]”.

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Arrows of Isha (AB-36), Flaming Attacks (BRB-69), Volley Fire (BRB-78)

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Requires Two Hands (BRB-75), Always Strikes Last (BRB-66)

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: -2 Saving Throw modifier versus non-magical shooting

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Fight in extra rank (not when charged)

characteristic.name: Special Rules
characteristic.value: Used only on charge, otherwise use handweapon

profile.name: Two/Additional Hand Weapons (Models on foot only)
